title: I have no idea what to tile this sorry, It involves music though.
body:
I was trying to think of a title but they all sounded stupid to me I apologize.

Does anyone know of any Good music making programs/Software?

And if you guys do have any of them, what do you guys make out of them?

I'm interested in seeing if I can make some tunes or something, or at least creating this stupid tune I made up as a kid -as its never left me :(. Stupid repetitive sounds.

replies.body: FL studio is one of the best/hardest. Check out youtube,, I think there's a few decent easier ones
